page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
CREDITS
The survey, text and photographs of block 04400291 was completed with the help of all the 4th year children of Sketchley Hill Primary School, their parents and their teacher Miss Vivien Taylor. The text includes written contributions from:
JIMMY HEATHCOTE LOUISE HARE MICHAEL LOVE MARK MANSFIELD VANESSA HUNT NICCI CAVE CATHERINE LOUCH DAVINA GAIR HELEN BLACKHURST KATE STAGG PAUL SPICER KIRSY ARNETT GLENN BROOKES ANDREW MORGAN ALLAN HEATHMAN MATTHEW EVERITT SIMON FLETCHER ALISON CARR LEANNE CURETON RICHARD TARLTON
